about_the_game:
This game is dedicated to the followers of great legendary Dragonborn and bring their fascinations together. Here we present our first battle-royal-like game mode with well-acquainted experience and playstyle.

Survival & Mission are the top-priority during field playing. In this new arcane world, the mission you choose or have to finish will decide who you are going to be, either a threat or target to other players. You are free to ESC with triumph only if at least one mission you are responsible of is considered as "Completed".

The core of playing is about game exploring and player interacting, circumstances and choices you made are going to impact what events and challenges are coming next.

  • Fight, or not with every player stranger you met, the hostility or harmlessness depends on their tasks, instincts or greeds.

  • Equip different weapons and spells on your right hand and left hand, you can either be a berserker or a witchblade.

  • Explore and find many resources as you can to make it through, strong, and score.

  • All randomly generated tasks and events for each gambit.

  • First person or third person, shoot or melee, play as your favorites.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages: violence, morality choices.
